name: FxColorGamutAPI
desc: A protocol that defines the host application methods for retrieving information about a project's color gamut and conversions to other color spaces.

items.name: func colorPrimaries() -> FxColorPrimaries
items.desc: Provides an enumerated type that describes the color primaries of the project's working gamut.

items.name: typealias FxColorPrimaries
items.desc: Constants used to describe a set of color primaries.
